charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted Emmet around
town, looking a bit lost.
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_1201_0200:
Urgent message from Archeops! Quickly wrap up
the safety check!
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_1201_0400:
I was riding the Battle Subway. Before I knew it,
I’d arrived here!
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_1201_0500:
Last stop, Pasio. Pasio. No transfers are available
at this station.
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_1201_0600:
From the looks of it, there aren’t any tracks here.
I wonder how I got off at this stop in the
first place.
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_1201_0700:
Well, I guess trying to make sense of things I don’t
understand doesn’t really change anything.
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_1201_0800:
So, what kind of place is Pasio, anyway? Tell me
all about it!
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_0302_1100: I hope I can explain it well...
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_0402_1200: It’s OK. Just tell me what you know!
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_1201_1400:
That explanation was the best. Perfect! I think I
understand what kind of place this is now!
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_1201_1500:
So what you’re saying is, this is an island where
we can enjoy serious Pokémon battles!
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_1201_1600: What kind of battles do you like?
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_0401_1800: I see! Sounds like we’ll get along just fine!
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_0402_2000: I see! Sounds like we’ll get along just fine!
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_1201_2100:
I like the idea of sync pairs, because I like
combinations. And I like winning more than
anything else.
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_1201_2200:
When you feel strongly that you want to win,
that leads to the most intense and exciting
battles ever!
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_1201_2300:
I want to have the best battles as a two-car
train with Archeops!
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_1201_2400:
That’s why I have to form a team that draws out
Archeops’s strengths even more!
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_1201_2500:
Archeops is actually better at running than flying.
But he’ll work hard at anything if it’s for the team.
Even if he’s not good at it.
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_1201_2600:
Together with Archeops, I think we’ll be running
on a new kind of track. One for teams of three!
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_0401_2800:
Thanks! If I were still a two-car train with Ingo,
things would just be the same as before.
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_0402_3000:
Thanks! If I were still a two-car train with Ingo,
things would just be the same as before.
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_1201_3100:
We want to explore new possibilities in order to
continue down this new track!
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_1201_3200:
I can tell that you could open up many possibilities
for us, too!
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_1201_3300:
Will you become our best rival? Or our
best teammate?
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_1201_3400:
Let’s battle now to see where our respective
tracks may meet!
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_0401_3600: That’s what I like to hear! I can’t wait!
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_0302_3700: OK! But I’m not gonna lose!
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_0402_3800:
I am Emmet. And I will be the one to reach the
final destination of victory!
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_1201_4000:
Follow the rules. Safe driving!
Follow the schedules. Everyone smile!
charaepi_ch0109_00_kudari/2301_1201_4100:
Check safety. Everything’s ready!
Aim for victory! All aboard!
